Title: Monthly Meeting
Descriptions: Monthly meeting for the Doddington Village Sports and Carnival Committee to discuss what is coming up next.
Please feel free to come along! Everyone is welcome and new input is always appreciated!

Title: Monthly Meeting
Descriptions: Monthly meeting for the Doddington Village Sports and Carnival Committee to discuss what is coming up next.
Please feel free to come along! Everyone is welcome and new input is always appreciated!

Title: Monthly Meeting
Descriptions: Monthly meeting for the Doddington Village Sports and Carnival Committee to discuss what is coming up next.
Please feel free to come along! Everyone is welcome and new input is always appreciated!

Title: Quiz Night
Descriptions: Come and test your knowledge at our upcoming Pub Quiz Night, which is being held to raise funds for the Doddington Village Sports & Carnival.
Max of 6 people per team; Winners will receive 50% of the Entry Money.

Title: Prince & Princess: Family Picnic
Descriptions: Come and join us to celebrate the King's Coronation, with an interlude to select the next Prince and Princess for the 2023!
Supported by Doddington Parish Council.

Title: Monthly Meeting
Descriptions: Monthly meeting for the Doddington Village Sports and Carnival Committee to discuss what is coming up next.
Please feel free to come along! Everyone is welcome and new input is always appreciated!

Title: Bunting Up
Descriptions: Decorative bunting around the village to help get everyone into the mood!
We would love any help that you could offer in directing traffic. Safety in numbers and all that!

Title: Monthly Meeting
Descriptions: Monthly meeting for the Doddington Village Sports and Carnival Committee to discuss what is coming up next.
Please feel free to come along! Everyone is welcome and new input is always appreciated!

Title: Annual Scarecrow Competition - Entry Deadline
Descriptions: Decorate and enter your Scarecrow to find Doddington's best!

Title: Annual Scarecrow Competition - Entry Maps Available
Descriptions: A map of the village will be made available that shows the various Scarecrow Entries for all to view.

Title: Annual Scarecrow Competition - Entries On Show!
Descriptions: All Scarecrow Entries need to be out on display in their location/setting for all to see and, ultimately, to be judged!

Title: Annual Scarecrow Competition - Judging
Descriptions: Judges will visit and assess all entries.
Winner will be announced on Carnival Day (1st July).

Title: Bunting Down
Descriptions: Removing the bunting from around the village, after the Carnival and Sports Day events are over.
As always, we would love any extra help to direct traffic.

Title: Carnival Road Closure
Descriptions: Main route through Doddington village closed off to vehicles.

Title: Carnival Fancy Dress Competition
Descriptions: Fancy dress competition behind the Three Tuns pub.

Title: Village Carnival
Descriptions: Free to spectate.
Road closes at 9am until 12:30pm
Carnival Procession departs at 10:30am

Title: Sports Day
Descriptions: ** Gates open at 13:30 **

Title: Quiz Night
Descriptions: Come and test your knowledge at our upcoming Pub Quiz Night, which is being held to raise funds for the Doddington Village Sports & Carnival.
Max of 6 people per team; Winners will receive 50% of the Entry Money.

Title: Santa Run
SubTitle: FRIDAY DAY 1
Descriptions: HO! HO! HO!
Doddington Carnival presents... SANTA RUN 2023!
Santa Claus will be joining us again this year for a tour of the Doddington village!
Starting on Friday evening, Day 1 of 3, and continuing on into Saturday and Sunday, we will be showing him the sights and sounds of Doddington
Make sure that you come out and tell Santa what you would like for Christmas!
All donations greatly appreciated and 100% goes to making the next Doddington Village Sports and Carnival even better!

Title: Santa Run
SubTitle: SATURDAY DAY 2
Descriptions: MERRY CHRISTMAS, EVERYBODY!
Doddington Carnival presents... SANTA RUN 2023!
This is Day 2 of our 3-day journey through the village, Santa Claus will be coming to see all the boys and girls.
Come out and tell Santa what you would like for Christmas!
All donations greatly appreciated and 100% goes to making the next Doddington Village Sports and Carnival even better!

Title: Santa Run
SubTitle: SUNDAY DAY 3
Descriptions: WE WISH YOU A MERRY CHRISTMAS!
Doddington Carnival presents... SANTA RUN 2023!
This is Day 3 of 3, with Santa Claus joining us for the final part of the tour around Doddington to see all the boys and girls.
Come out, sing along with our festive tunes and tell Santa what you would like for Christmas!
All donations greatly appreciated and 100% goes to making the next Doddington Village Sports and Carnival even better!
